collectible.title: Noire plushie
collectible.subtitle: のわぐるみ
collectible.text:
A gift to help you rest with a peace of mind when Noire herself cannot sleep next to you. Effectiveness confirmed by Uni.</br></br>
(Handmade by Plutia. She will happily present Noire with another one.)
collectible.unlock: Tire Noire and then let her experience something so unexciting that she falls asleep.

collectible.title: Noire's showdown lingerie (panties)
collectible.subtitle: ノワールの勝負下着(パンティ）
collectible.text:
Noire's favorite lingerie, which she gave to you as a keepsake after she lost it in a game of strip poker.</br></br>
Maybe the next time you meet, Noire will wear a similar set of underwear, maybe a different one... and maybe none at all?
collectible.unlock: Make Noire lose her lingerie and pose for you naked.

collectible.title: Noire's showdown lingerie (bra)
collectible.subtitle: ノワールの勝負下着(ブラ）
collectible.text:
Noire's favorite lingerie, which she gave to you as a keepsake after she lost it in a game of strip poker.</br></br>
Maybe the next time you meet, Noire will wear a similar set of underwear, maybe a different one... and maybe none at all?
collectible.unlock: Make Noire lose her lingerie and pose for you naked twice in one game.
